original_solution_mapping.L1: Barney uses 2 clean towels every day, so he uses 2 * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 towels a week.
original_solution_mapping.L2: He missed one week of laundry, so he would need 2 * 14 = <<2*14=28>>28 towels for 2 weeks.
original_solution_mapping.L3: He owns 18 towels, so he has 28 - 18 = <<28-18=10>>10 less than he needs.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, Barney will not have clean towels on 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5 days.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 3448.
    Returns: the number of days Barney will not have clean towels.
    """
    # L1
    towels_per_day = 2 # uses two at a time that he changes to clean towels daily
    days_per_week = 7 # WK
    towels_per_week = towels_per_day * days_per_week

    # L2
    weeks_missed_plus_current = 2 # missed one week of laundry
    towels_needed_for_two_weeks = weeks_missed_plus_current * towels_per_week

    # L3
    towels_owned = 18 # He owns eighteen towels
    towels_short = towels_needed_for_two_weeks - towels_owned

    # L4
    days_without_clean_towels = towels_short / towels_per_day

    # FA
    answer = days_without_clean_towels
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Barney uses {towels_per_day} clean towels every day, so he uses {towels_per_day} * {days_per_week} = <<{towels_per_day}*{days_per_week}={towels_per_week}>>{towels_per_week} towels a week.

He missed one week of laundry, so he would need {weeks_missed_plus_current} * {towels_per_week} = <<{weeks_missed_plus_current}*{towels_per_week}={towels_needed_for_two_weeks}>>{towels_needed_for_two_weeks} towels for {weeks_missed_plus_current} weeks.
He owns {towels_owned} towels, so he has {towels_needed_for_two_weeks} - {towels_owned} = <<{towels_needed_for_two_weeks}-{towels_owned}={towels_short}>>{towels_short} less than he needs.
Thus, Barney will not have clean towels on {towels_short} / {towels_per_day} = <<{towels_short}/{towels_per_day}={days_without_clean_towels}>>{days_without_clean_towels} days.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Barney uses 2 clean towels every day, so he uses 2 * 7 = <<2*7=14>>14 towels a week.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He missed one week of laundry, so he would need 7 * 14 = <<7*14=98>>98 towels for 7 weeks.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He owns 18 towels, so he has 98 - 18 = <<98-18=80>>80 less than he needs.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: Thus, Barney will not have clean towels on 80 / 2 = <<80/2=40>>40 days.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'days_per_week' (7) was used instead of 'weeks_missed_plus_current' (2).
